database.name: massive
database.description: The Massive Database contains information about all the proteomics/metabolomics datasets in massive

entry.name: Mapping the H+(V)-ATPase interactome
entry.description: Immunoprecipitations from total mouse kidney lysates with antibodies specific to B1 subunit of V-ATPase (IP1, IP2, IP3 and IP4) and various negative controls (IP1beads, IP4beads, IP5beads, IP6KO, IP7KO, IP2peptide, IP3peptide).
